titles.title: To amend the Soldiers' and Sailors' Civil Relief Act of 1940 to treat certain National Guard duty as military service under that Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Benefits.

bill.summary: 12/6/2001--Introduced. Amends the Soldiers' and Sailors' Civil Relief Act of 1940 to treat as military service for purposes of such Act National Guard training or other duty authorized at the request of the President for or in support of an operation during a war or national emergency declared by the President or Congress.
